entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as not speaking at once and taking off his glasses to clean them slowly on his robes.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as knowing the position has changed and accepting that Harry will have to be filled in.

entities.name: mo lly
entities.description: Molly Weasley is referred to by her first name 'Mo' and is described as having a conversation with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as speaking quietly and agreeing with Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is referred to by name and is looked away from by Lupin.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as staying at headquarters and needing to be filled in on the facts.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is referred to by her title and first name 'Molly' and is described as turning quickly to Lupin for an ally.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley mentions that Dumbledore knows the position has changed.
Molly Weasley is having a conversation with Mr. Weasley.
Lupin agrees with Mrs. Weasley's opinion.
Mr. Weasley mentions that Harry will have to be filled in on the facts.
